## ComposedDataFilter class

An \[\[OmvFeatureFilter\]\] implementation that delegates all filter decision returning `true` for any predicate if all delegates return `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ComposedDataFilter implements OmvFeatureFilter 
```
